SCRIPT.MSCRI:
:SET &STATUS# = GET_UC_OBJECT_STATUS(,,"RETCODE") :SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS# = "" :IF &STATUS# EQ 0 : SET &HND# = PREP_PROCESS_REPORT("JOBS",, "REP","UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS*","COL=DELIMITER", 'DELIMITER=*::=*') : PROCESS &HND# : SET &KEY# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,1) : SET &VALUE# = GET_PROCESS_LINE(&HND#,2) : IF &KEY# = "UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS" : SET &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS# = &VALUE# : TERM_PROCESS : ENDIF : ENDPROCESS : CLOSE_PROCESS &HND# : IF &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS# EQ "" : MODIFY_STATE STATUS_TEXT="Build status not found in job report" : MODIFY_STATE RETCODE=50 : ENDIF :ENDIF
:PUBLISH &UC4RB_OPENSHIFT_BUILD_STATUS#,,"WORKFLOW"
